A post shared by Hania Aamir 哈尼亚·阿米尔 (@haniaheheofficial)  Hania captioned the video, "nobody more iconic than shalini passi period (sic)." The post quickly went viral, earning praise from fans and even a response from Shalini Passi herself. Commenting on Hania’s post, Passi wrote, "Love you princess (sic)," to which Hania replied, "the queen herself (sic)."  At a recent Business Today Most Powerful Women Awards event, Shalini Passi reflected on her unique style and public persona. "I never wanted to be the 'it' girl because I am not the 'it' girl. It's my personal style. I was just having fun. I thought people might not like it because it's a little maximalist. The makeup artist told me not to put so many clips, but I just wanted to," she said. The Netflix series 'Fabulous Lives of Bollywood Wives' features Shalini Passi alongside Seema Sajdeh, Neelam Kothari, Maheep Kapoor, Bhavana Pandey, Riddhima Kapoor Sahni, and Kalyani Saha, with special appearances by Bollywood stars like Karan Johar, Gauri Khan, Ananya Panday, and Chunky Pandey. The show continues to entertain audiences with its glitzy portrayal of Bollywood's elite social circles.

Title: Karan-Arjun initially starred SRK, Ajay Devgn
Content: As the 1995 Bollywood blockbuster 'Karan Arjun' gears up for a re-release on November 22, filmmaker Rakesh Roshan has revealed surprising details about the film's original casting. In an interview, Rakesh disclosed that Ajay Devgn was initially considered for the role alongside Shah Rukh Khan, not Salman Khan. Rakesh shared that when he first conceptualized 'Karan Arjun', he approached Shah Rukh Khan, who had previously worked with him in the 1993 film 'King Uncle'. Interestingly, Rakesh Roshan was the first producer to pay Shah Rukh Khan, as his debut film 'Deewana' (1992) was still incomplete at the time. Rakesh also cast Ajay Devgn, with whom he had a long-standing connection through Ajay's father, action choreographer Veeru Devgn. Recalling the initial discussions, Rakesh said, “They both came to me – Shah Rukh and Ajay. They said, ‘Sir, we want to talk to you. We want to interchange our image. My (Shah Rukh's) image is romantic, his (Ajay's) image is of an action hero. I want to do action, and he'd do romantic.' I asked them how that would benefit the film. They got thinking. I said if it works in the film's favour, then only I'd do it no. 'If I do it, the film wouldn't work. I'm keeping in mind your image. I'd give him romance, and I'd also give you action to do. They both do action and romance. I'm making a wholesome film so you don't worry about that.' But they weren't convinced,” said Rakesh in Hindi.” When the initial pairing didn’t work out, Rakesh approached Salman Khan and Aamir Khan, fresh off their success in the 1994 cult classic 'Andaz Apna Apna'. However, Shah Rukh later returned. "Then Shah Rukh came back to me. He said, ‘No no, let me do it. You gave me my break. I'm getting sleepless nights that I'm not doing the film.' So I told Aamir that now I have Shah Rukh's dates,” Rakesh revealed. 'Karan Arjun', produced by Filmkraft Productions, stars Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan in the titular roles, alongside Kajol, Mamta Kulkarni, Raakhee, Amrish Puri, Johnny Lever, and Ranjit. The film remains a cult classic and a hallmark of Bollywood's reincarnation genre.

Title: Bohemia pays tribute to Attaullah Esakhelvi; fans praise the bond
Content: Renowned Pakistani-American rapper Bohemia recently had a heartfelt interaction with legendary Pakistani folk singer Attaullah Esakhelvi, leaving fans in awe of the mutual respect and admiration between the two artists. The emotional encounter took place in London, where Bohemia expressed his deep admiration for Esakhelvi, describing the meeting as a "reward" in itself. Bohemia, whose rise to fame came through his distinctive fusion of Punjabi rap and traditional music, has long been a household name in both Pakistan and among international audiences. His collaborations, notably with prominent Pakistani singer Sajjad Ali on the hit song Tamasha, have garnered millions of views on platforms like YouTube, further solidifying his global stature. During the meeting, Bohemia shared his profound respect for Esakhelvi, a figure whose influence in the Pakistani music scene spans decades. Known for his soulful folk ballads and deep-rooted connection to the cultural fabric of Pakistan, Esakhelvi has earned the reverence of generations of music lovers. A post shared by Murtaza ali shah (@murtazaviews)  In a moment captured by journalist Murtaza Ali Shah on his Instagram, Bohemia is seen speaking fondly of Esakhelvi, noting that the opportunity to meet the icon felt like receiving an award. “Meeting Attaullah Esakhelvi is like an award for me,” Bohemia shared, highlighting the legendary status of the singer who continues to inspire musicians across various genres. Fans of both artists were quick to praise the moment, with many commenting on the mutual respect that was evident between the two. Some highlighted the fact that Bohemia, a celebrated figure in his own right, continues to honor the legacy of those who paved the way for him, making him a revered figure not just in music but in the broader cultural landscape.  Many also expressed admiration for Bohemia’s humility and the genuine love he has for the music that has shaped his career. “Bohemia’s success is not just due to his talent, but also his respect for the traditions and legends that have come before him,” one fan commented.

Title: Kylie Jenner stuns fans with trendsetting new look
Content: Kylie Jenner, renowned business mogul and reality television star, has once again captivated her global audience with a series of striking images and videos shared on Instagram on November 16. The 27-year-old, who helms the beauty brand Kylie Cosmetics, showcased a fashion-forward, librarian-inspired ensemble in her latest photo dump, which quickly went viral. The post featured Jenner donning a black leather miniskirt paired with knee-high boots, layered with a chic trench coat. Adding a touch of elegance, the mother-of-two was seen applying lip gloss in one of the snapshots. A post shared by ᴋɪɴɢ ᴋʏʟɪᴇ ɪs ᴍʏ ʙᴏss 👑 ¡fanpage! (@kyliesbae)  In another playful moment, the youngest of the Kardashian-Jenner clan struggled to hold onto a group of puppies, a scene that charmed her followers. Jenner captioned the post, “Just a girl,” leaving fans in awe of her effortless style. Her Instagram comments section was inundated with admiration. “I love this look,” wrote one follower, while another praised her unique take on office-inspired fashion, calling it “office drag at its finest.” The post comes on the heels of a high-profile campaign launch featuring Jenner and her close friend, model Amelia Gray Hamlin. On November 15, the duo shared sizzling photographs from a shoot where they sported coordinated outfits, solidifying their status as trendsetters in the fashion world.

Title: Fans amazed by Sonam Bajwa’s fresh post
Content: Indian actress Sonam Bajwa knows the art of captivating the attention of fans not only with her acting prowess but also with her appearance on the social media platform. Taking to Instagram, the “Honsla Rakh” star is seen posing for a video in a boisterous fashion. In the clip, the background can be heard. For the post, she captioned: “Missed posting this video.” She is seen wearing a golden saree and left her fans smitten with the way she flashes her smile. Her dedicated followers took no time to compliment Sonam and went on to drop plenty of penning comments and emoticons in the feedback section. One of the fans acknowledged Sonam for wearing the saree, saying, “The saree is God’s gift to every woman. Beautiful.” Another of the netizens dropped a variety of the emojis to praise the starlet. Sonam’s popularity on social media can be witnessed with the number of her followers on Instagram, which surpassed over 14 million.

Title: And the Oscars 2025 host will be ... Conan O’Brien!
Content: Comedian, writer and former late-night host Conan O’Brien will be the host of the 97th Oscars, the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences said on Friday. It will be the Emmy-winner's first time hosting the ceremony, which will air live from the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles on ABC on Sunday, March 2, 2025. “He is the perfect person to help lead our global celebration of film with his brilliant humor, his love of movies, and his live TV expertise," Academy CEO Bill Kramer and President Janet Yang said in a statement. "His remarkable ability to connect with audiences will bring viewers together to do what the Oscars do best--honor the spectacular films and filmmakers of this year.” O'Brien, 61, had his own comedic quip on his new gig. "America demanded it and now it’s happening: Taco Bell’s new Cheesy Chalupa Supreme. In other news, I’m hosting the Oscars,” said O’Brien. The comedian is best known for hosting the late-night talk shows “Late Night with Conan O’Brien,” “The Tonight Show with Conan O’Brien” and “Conan.” He follows in the footsteps of fellow comedian Jimmy Kimmel, who hosted the 2024 Oscars. "Conan has all the qualities of a great Oscars host--he is incredibly witty, charismatic and funny and has proven himself to be a master of live event television,” said Oscars executive producers Raj Kapoor and Katy Mullan.

Title: Adnan Siddiqui meets King Charles III at Buckingham Palace
Content: Pakistani actor Adnan Siddiqui met with British King Charles III at Buckingham Palace during a prestigious event honouring global film and TV industry figures. The event, hosted by King Charles, celebrated the artistic contributions of artists from around the world, with Siddiqui among the distinguished guests. Sharing the experience with his fans on his Instagram account, Siddiqui described the brief but unforgettable meeting, expressing that even after the interaction, the thought of the King remained fresh in his mind. "Our conversation was brief but vibrant—a meeting of different worlds in the blink of an eye. His Majesty had a unique ability to put people at ease, leaving a lingering spark. It’s not every day you meet someone whose presence lingers in your thoughts long after the moment has passed," wrote Adnan with a few pictures from the event. A post shared by Adnan Siddiqui (@adnansid1)  At the event, King Charles personally greeted Siddiqui, shaking hands and appreciating his work in the entertainment industry. The occasion also marked the premiere of the highly anticipated 'Gladiator 2', featuring Hollywood stars such as Denzel Washington and Pedro Pascal. The premiere was a highlight of the evening, drawing attention from global film lovers and industry insiders. The event was further elevated by the presence of stars from iconic films such as 'Titanic' and 'Gladiator', with the costumes from some of the most celebrated dramas on display. The royal band added to the grandeur of the evening, playing a melodious tune to welcome the distinguished guests.

Title: Netflix hopes for live sports knockout with Paul-Tyson fight
Content: A showdown between former heavyweight champion Mike Tyson and social media influencer-turned-fighter Jake Paul on Friday is the latest one-two punch from Netflix, as the media giant hopes to cash in on sports' sprint to streaming. The intergenerational showdown has all the makings of a crossover hit, with 58-year-old Tyson bringing in the old guard and 27-year-old Paul, who achieved early fame on YouTube, appealing to the younger, screen-toting social media junkies. Available to all of Netflix's more than 280 million subscribers for no additional fee, it could be a welcome change for American boxing fans accustomed to shelling out extra to watch marquee matches on long-time broadcaster HBO. "The trend in all sports right now is moving some of their properties to streaming," said Bob Dorfman, a veteran San Francisco-based sports marketing analyst. "This is two huge personalities - it does have the potential to be the biggest streaming sports event." The American subscription television network HBO announced in 2018 it was dropping live boxing from its programming, ending a 45-year relationship with the sport and leaving a broadcasting vacuum in its wake. Netflix has dabbled in sports content before, with exhibition golf and tennis events and the wildly popular docuseries "Formula 1: Drive to Survive," which is credited with boosting the auto racing circuit's popularity in the U.S. The fight at the 80,000-capacity AT&T Stadium in Arlington, Texas, its first live boxing event, works in favour of Netflix's strategy of providing proprietary content that viewers cannot find elsewhere. While the fight will not have traditional advertising, it has sponsors whose messages will be part of the live-streamed event. Advertising is not a major contributor to the streamer's current revenue, though its ad-supported tier is quickly growing, with 70 million subscribers reported this week, up from 40 million in May. The mega-event is the sign of a lasting love affair between sport and streaming, said Neal Pilson, the former president of CBS Sports, though he predicts streaming, and traditional broadcast will exist side-by-side for the foreseeable future. "This is a one-time-only event... It's more as a novelty in my view. It doesn't change the industry," said Pilson, president of Pilson Communications. "The industry is still going to be driven by the league deals (like) MLS, NFL, Major League Baseball." Amazon Prime picked up Thursday Night Football in 2021 and MLS signed a 10-year mega-deal with Apple TV in 2022 worth a reported $2.5 billion. Major League Baseball signed a deal with Apple for "Friday Night Baseball," a weekly doubleheader, in 2022, as well. Leagues have been gravitating to streaming both because it reaches a global audience, including younger viewers, who are not watching traditional television. MLS Commissioner Don Garber said the Apple streaming platform allows MLS to better take advantage of the sport's global fanbase. "We were seeing the difficulty of getting an audience and getting the economics right with local and regional television - we saw that in 2018," Garber said this week at the Paley International Council Summit. "We wanted to go to the market with a global package... We have a subscription that's global, every one of our 600 games is treated like 'Monday Night Football'."

Title: Is Kate Middleton’s health in danger after recent royal setbacks?
Content: Kate Middleton’s recovery from cancer treatment, which she completed in September after a prolonged nine-month battle, is reportedly being undermined by the increasing pressures from her royal duties and recent family crises.While the Princess had initially planned a gradual return to public engagements, sources reveal that she is now facing new challenges, both personally and professionally. Kate marked her return to royal responsibilities by attending the solemn Remembrance Sunday services earlier this month, a poignant occasion that symbolized her commitment to her royal role despite the toll on her health. Additionally, the Princess is preparing for her annual Christmas carol concert, which she is personally organizing. However, behind these events lies a mounting pressure that is beginning to affect her well-being. A source close to the royal family disclosed to InTouch Weekly that the strain of balancing her recovery with increasing royal responsibilities is taking a noticeable toll on Kate. “Kate was just trying to concentrate on getting back on her feet after her cancer battle,” the insider explained. “So, the strain must be taking a toll.” The setback comes at a time when the royal family faces public scrutiny over financial matters and environmental concerns. A recent documentary revealed the “secret millions” earned by King Charles and Prince William from their private estates, further fuelling public discontent. The documentary highlights the royals' earnings from public-sector establishments, such as NHS hospitals, prisons, and charities, prompting widespread criticism. Adding to the controversy, Prince William’s property holdings have come under fire for failing to adhere to government-imposed environmental restrictions. These revelations have placed additional strain on the royal family’s image, with Palace aides reportedly instructing Kate and William to maintain a positive public image in the wake of the scandals. Despite the challenges, the Princess and her husband, Prince William, are being called upon to shoulder more responsibilities, particularly as their potential ascension to the throne seems increasingly imminent. The couple, already grappling with a challenging year, now faces the reality that they may have to take on the roles of King and Queen sooner than anticipated. “It’s a unique burden that comes with being next in line to the throne,” an insider remarked. “Kate and William have had to step up and prepare for what lies ahead, regardless of the personal toll it takes.”

Title: 'Nimbu paani toh peene do': ACP Pradyuman asks fans to wait for new CID season
Content: One of India's most beloved television shows, "CID", is making a comeback with its much-anticipated second season, and fans are already buzzing with excitement. The announcement was made recently, and since then, viewers have been eagerly waiting for the release date to be revealed. Adding fuel to the fire, actor Shivaji Satam, who plays the iconic ACP Pradyuman, has teased the launch with a special video message. In a fun clip shared by Sony Entertainment Television on Instagram, Shivaji Satam, in character as ACP Pradyuman, acknowledges the overwhelming fan reactions regarding the new season. Teasing viewers further, he humorously says, "Nimbu paani toh peene do, bohut garmi hai, abhi batate hai," (Let me drink the lemon water, I'll tell you soon). His playful hint has only intensified fans' anticipation for the upcoming release. A post shared by Sony Entertainment Television (@sonytvofficial)  Reactions from fans have flooded in, with many expressing their excitement. One fan eagerly commented, "Come Soon ACP Sir," while another guessed the release date, saying, "mtlb sir garmi main aane wala hai" (It looks like it's coming in the heat). Several others dropped fire emojis, signaling their eagerness for the return of the iconic detective series. According to sources, the shooting for "CID" Season 2 is scheduled to begin around November 15, with the series expected to premiere in December 2024, around the Christmas or New Year period. A source close to the production shared, "Over the years, audiences have given so much love to the TV show, and now is the time to give back the love to the audience." The excitement is further amplified by a thrilling promo that has fans speculating about the storyline. The clip shows a dramatic face-off between characters Daya and Abhijeet, culminating in a shocking moment where Daya falls from a mountain after ACP Pradyuman shouts his name and Abhijeet fires a gun. The makers have hinted that more surprises are in store, urging viewers to stay tuned to Sony Entertainment Television’s social media for the official release date. Originally airing on January 21, 1998, and continuing until October 27, 2018, "CID" has gained a cult following, and the return of the show for a second season comes after years of public demand.

Title: Unbelievable! King Charles faces major health battle on his 76th birthday
Content: King Charles III celebrates his 76th birthday on Thursday, continuing to serve as Britain’s head of state despite a year marked by health challenges and personal hardships. Still undergoing cancer treatment, the King’s commitment to his royal duties remains unwavering, as he defies the physical toll of his illness, with his son and heir, Prince William, describing this year as “brutal.” The monarch, who paused his official duties in February after a cancer diagnosis, returned to public service at the end of April, resuming his duties with renewed vigour. "The problem is trying to stop him," remarked Queen Camilla, his wife, on multiple occasions, highlighting Charles’s relentless drive. In recent weeks, King Charles and Queen Camilla resumed their international travel, visiting Australia and Samoa for a Commonwealth Heads of Government meeting. Sources close to the royal couple revealed that the King returned “invigorated” from the 11-day trip, with plans to continue his overseas engagements in the coming year. Having ascended the throne following the death of his mother, Queen Elizabeth II, in September 2022, King Charles had already made history as the longest-serving heir apparent in British history, having waited 70 years to take the throne. Despite the challenges of his health, he remains committed to fulfilling his constitutional role “throughout the remaining time God grants me,” as he pledged during his accession. This past Sunday, Charles led the nation in a poignant two-minute silence at the Cenotaph memorial in London, a key moment in the national calendar, commemorating British service members who have lost their lives in battle since 1914. The day before, he attended a commemorative concert at the Royal Albert Hall with his son, Prince William, and daughter-in-law, Princess Catherine, who had recently completed chemotherapy for her own cancer treatment. The King’s birthday will be marked by ceremonial gun salutes, a long-standing royal tradition. However, he will not have the day off; instead, he is set to attend the opening of a food redistribution centre in south London, which is part of his “Coronation Food Project” aimed at tackling food waste and supporting vulnerable communities. This initiative, launched on his 75th birthday, is close to his heart, and he will inspect a newly installed industrial freezer at the facility. It has been a particularly testing year for the royal family. King Charles’s relationship with his younger son, Prince Harry, and his wife Meghan remains distant, while both Charles’s and Prince William’s financial matters were the subject of controversy following recent allegations aired in a documentary. Additionally, discussions about reparations for Britain’s colonial past gained traction during the Commonwealth summit earlier this year. However, it is the health issues within the family that have dominated headlines. Following his prostate operation, Buckingham Palace confirmed that the King had been diagnosed with cancer, though the specific type has yet to be disclosed. His wife, Queen Camilla, also experienced health setbacks this year, with a lung infection forcing her to cancel several engagements. In March, Princess Catherine, who is widely admired for her public presence, revealed that she too had been battling cancer, though the details of her diagnosis remain private. After completing her chemotherapy, Catherine shared a heartfelt message on social media in early September, which was met with widespread praise. She has since gradually resumed her royal duties, much to the relief of her supporters. Prince William, speaking candidly earlier this month during a visit to South Africa, acknowledged the emotional strain on the family. "Honestly, it’s been dreadful. It’s probably been the hardest year in my life," he said. "But from a personal family point of view, it’s been, yeah, it’s been brutal." The royal family’s health remains under close scrutiny, and recent trips have been carefully managed to ensure their well-being. A doctor accompanied the King and Queen on their trip to Australia and Samoa, and on their return journey, they spent several days at a wellness retreat in India. However, the King was forced to cancel his planned trip to Baku, Azerbaijan, for the COP29 climate summit due to health concerns.

Title: First ever UAE contestant to debut at Miss Universe 2024
Content: For the first time, the UAE will be represented on the Miss Universe stage, with model and mother-of-three Emilia Dobreva taking on the role after being crowned Miss Universe UAE in a private audition held in October. National director for the UAE, Poppy Capella, appointed by the Miss Universe Organisation, praised Emilia as an ideal choice. “She was the perfect choice for Miss Universe UAE. She has been living in the UAE for over a decade, is married to an Emirati man, speaks Arabic and is a beautiful and smart woman.” A post shared by Missuniverseuae2024 (@missuniverseuae2024)  Emilia will join contestants from 130 countries at the Miss Universe grand finale in Mexico City on November 16. She will wear a unique abaya in the national costume round, featuring real sand from the UAE and design elements symbolizing the country’s modernity. “The bottom of her abaya will have real sand taken from the country and the top part of her abaya will reflect the modernity that this country has achieved. The gown will truly embody the UAE, showing how it has built up a modern country from the sand," Poppy said. Previously, only unmarried girls between 18 and 28 years of age were allowed to participate in the Miss Universe contest. But last year, Miss Universe lifted previous restrictions related to age, height, weight, and marital status, aiming to transform the event into a platform empowering women. Alongside the UAE, nine other countries are debuting at Miss Universe, including Somalia’s first hijabi contestant. A post shared by EMILIA DOBREVA 🇦🇪🇽🇰 (@miss_dobreva_official)  She added that respecting UAE culture was paramount. “Emilia will wear a fully covered swimsuit, also known as the burqini, in the swimwear round at the international competition. Her clothes are also modest, in line with the local culture.” The highlight of Miss Universe UAE was the stunning Dh15 million "Palm of Inclusion" crown, crafted by luxury jeweler Mouwad.

Title: SIFC launches Green Tourism initiative to boost Pakistan's tourism sector
Content: The Special Investment Facilitation Council (SIFC) has launched a comprehensive Green Tourism initiative to enhance Pakistan's tourism potential at the global level. The program, collaborating with more than 30 government organizations, aims to showcase Pakistan's diverse tourism offerings, including religious sites, mountaineering destinations, and heritage locations. Green Tourism will establish a digital platform providing tourists with convenient access to booking services, professional guides, and accommodation facilities through mobile phones. The initiative focuses on promoting Pakistan through sports and events, targeting both domestic and international audiences. Plans are underway to attract international events to Pakistan as part of efforts to elevate the country's global profile. SIFC is considering establishing a Human Resource Institute while promoting partnerships under the Green Tourism framework. The organization's facilitation efforts, combined with positive government measures, are expected to expand Pakistan's tourism sector. The program represents a structured approach to highlight Pakistan's tourist attractions, encompassing religious pilgrimages, mountaineering adventures, and historical heritage sites.

Title: Princess Kate wears Diana’s ring again — What’s hidden meaning?
Content: Princess Kate’s recent appearance at the Festival of Remembrance, wearing her iconic sapphire engagement ring once owned by Princess Diana, has sparked discussions among royal watchers and jewelry experts. The Princess of Wales, 42, wore the piece publicly for the first time in months, and many speculate that it holds a deeper message of continuity and respect for the Royal Family. Experts suggest that Kate's decision to wear the ring, originally inherited by Prince Harry but later passed to Prince William, may symbolize her appreciation for the family’s legacy. Tobias Kormind, Managing Director of 77 Diamonds, noted that the ring was famously worn by Diana even after her divorce and, today, serves as a connection between generations of the family. "It speaks to a strong sense of continuity and perhaps a subtle nod to Kate’s appreciation for the Royal Family," Kormind told GB News. The Festival of Remembrance event took place ahead of Remembrance Sunday, where Kate attended the service at the Cenotaph, dressed in a classic black Catherine Walker coat dress. Her ensemble also featured Queen Elizabeth II’s Bahrain Pearl Drop Earrings, a Juliette Millinery hat, and a Mulberry clutch, which she has used since 2013.Her fashion choices were widely regarded as a respectful tribute to both the late Queen Elizabeth and Princess Diana, subtly honoring the family’s enduring legacy.

Title: Sidhu’s shocking comeback on The Kapil Sharma Show – watch Archana’s reaction!
Content: In a surprising twist, former cricketer and ex-judge of The Kapil Sharma Show Navjot Singh Sidhu is set to make a comeback to the show after a five-year hiatus. The much-anticipated return, teased in a new promo for The Great Indian Kapil Show, has already created a buzz among fans. Sidhu’s reunion with Kapil Sharma comes after a controversial exit in 2019, and his appearance on the show has sparked mixed reactions, particularly from his replacement, Archana Puran Singh. The promo reveals Sidhu seated in the iconic judge’s chair, a position he once occupied for years, while Archana Puran Singh looks visibly taken aback. In a playful exchange, Kapil Sharma jokes that Archana’s new makeover has turned her into Sidhu, but the former cricketer quickly clears the confusion, asserting that it is indeed him sitting in the chair. Archana, caught off guard, humorously demands that Kapil intervene, asking him to tell Sidhu to vacate her seat. A post shared by Navjot Singh Sidhu (@navjotsinghsidhu)  “Kapil, tell Sardar Sahab to get off my seat. He’s taken over my spot,” she says in the promo, to which Harbhajan Singh, also appearing in the episode, sides with Sidhu, claiming no one can ever replace the original judge. Despite the dramatic promo, the show’s producers have confirmed that Sidhu will not be reclaiming his position as the permanent judge. Instead, he will appear as a guest along with his wife, Navjot Kaur, while cricketer Harbhajan Singh and actress Geeta Basra will also join the fun. The episode promises plenty of laughs as Sunil Grover takes on the role of impersonating Sidhu, recreating his trademark style. Sidhu’s return to the show marks a significant moment, as he had been absent since 2019, following the fallout over his controversial remarks regarding the Pulwama terror attack. In the aftermath of the attack, Sidhu’s comments that terrorism should not be attributed to an entire nation sparked outrage across India, leading to widespread calls for his removal from The Kapil Sharma Show. As tensions simmered, the channel decided to replace Sidhu with Archana Puran Singh, who has since become a beloved presence on the show. At the time, Sidhu defended his statements, claiming he had been absent due to a legislative session and had no prior intimation of his removal from the show. "If it is regarding my statement, I will stick to what I have been saying yesterday, today, and ever tomorrow," he wrote on social media. The new episode, featuring Sidhu’s highly anticipated return, promises to be a delightful mix of nostalgia and humor. Fans of the show are eager to see the former judge back in action, even if only for a brief appearance. As the show continues to captivate audiences, the question on everyone’s mind remains: will Sidhu ever return to the judge’s chair permanently, or will Archana Puran Singh continue to rule in his absence?

Title: Shah Rukh Khan shines in luxury look, sports 5 crore INR watch
Content: Shah Rukh Khan brought serious style to IIFA 2024, proving once again that age is just a number for Bollywood's King Khan. His sophisticated look was enhanced by an impressive selection of accessories, particularly his luxury watch and jewellery. A post shared by Shah Rukh Khan’s Wardrobe (@srkswardrobe)  Known for his appreciation of high-end timepieces, Shah Rukh wore an Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Double Balance Wheel Openworked watch, a masterpiece in 41mm 18-carat rose gold with a gem-set bezel that combines elegance with bold design. This iconic watch, model number 15412OR.RR.1220OR.01, is highly sought after among luxury watch collectors, priced at an impressive 4.6 crore INR. A post shared by Pooja Dadlani Gurnani (@poojadadlani02)  Shah Rukh's manager, Pooja Dadlani, shared photos of him on Instagram with the caption, "The perfect host looking sharp as ever… a magical evening at @iifa awards!" In the pictures, SRK looked striking in a brown satin shirt with open buttons, layered under a rust-toned, glossy black blazer with rolled-up sleeves for a modern twist. He completed the look with tailored dark green trousers, a bronze belt, a layered gold necklace by Sabyasachi, brown loafers, perfectly styled hair, and a neatly trimmed beard. On the work front, Shah Rukh Khan is gearing up for the release of 'Mufasa: The Lion King', where he lends his voice to the Hindi version of the film. He is also working on an action-packed project titled 'King', where he stars alongside his daughter Suhana Khan and Abhishek Bachchan.

Title: Taylor Swift, Tyla triumph at MTV Europe Music Awards
Content: Pop megastar Taylor Swift was the big winner at the MTV Europe Music Awards on Sunday, picking up four trophies at the Manchester ceremony in England, which included a tribute to late singer Liam Payne. Swift, who had led nominations with seven nods, won best artist, best video for her collaboration with Post Malone "Fortnight", best live and best US act. Currently in North America for her Eras tour, she thanked fans via a video message. "The fact that you have honoured the tour, everything that's happened with the album this year, the video, it's just unbelievable," said Swift, who released her latest album "The Tortured Poets Department" in April. South African singer Tyla followed with three prizes - best Afrobeats, best R&B and best African act. The awards resumed after last year's Paris event was cancelled shortly after the outbreak of the Gaza war, in which Israel's military is fighting Hamas militants. Held in a different city each year, Sunday's show took place at Manchester's new Co-Op Live venue. Singer and third time MTV EMAs show host Rita Ora led a tribute to late One Direction member Liam Payne, who died last month after falling from a third-floor hotel room balcony in Buenos Aires. He was 31. "He was a big part of the MTV world and my world and I think a lot of yours at home and everybody in here tonight," a visibly emotional Ora, who collaborated with Payne for 2018 song "For You", said. "He brought so much joy to every room he walked into and he left such a mark on this world." Other winners on Sunday night included Sabrina Carpenter, whose hit "Espresso" won best song, Ariana Grande who took the best pop award and Eminem who triumphed in the best hip-hop category. Best K-pop went to Jimin, Mexican singer Peso Pluma won best Latin while Manchester native Liam Gallagher took best rock. U.S. singer Benson Boone won best new category. Other honourees included US rapper Busta Rhymes, who performed a medley of his hits and received the global icon award and pop pioneer award recipients British electro-pop duo Pet Shop Boys, who closed the show.

Title: Fans smitten by TikToker Jannat Mirza's jaw-dropping stills
Content: Renowned Pakistani TikToker Jannat Mirza had grabbed the eyeballs of fans in a very short period, courtesy her captivating content on the social media platform. Taking to Instagram, the “Shayar” star dropped a fresh set of clicks, in which she is seen cheering with joy. A post shared by Jannat Mirza (@jannatmirza_)  The credit goes to the diva for proving her fans once again that she is a fashionista. For the clicks, she is seen wearing minimum makeup and the way she smile, it takes the photos to another level. Fans reacted to the photos by dropping plenty of comments and feedback to laud the starlet. In the comments box, one of the users wrote: “Look so beautiful.” Another of the users dropped a variety of emoticons to compliment Jannat. Jannat has garnered over six million followers on her Instagram handle. A post shared by Jannat Mirza (@jannatmirza_)

Title: Rahat Fateh Ali Khan’s heartwarming interaction with Sanjay Dutt goes viral
Content: Rahat Fateh Ali Khan, a renowned Pakistani classical singer with global acclaim, continues to captivate audiences worldwide with his exceptional music. Known for hit songs, ghazals, and qawwalis, Rahat holds the distinction of having the first Pakistani song, 'Zaroori Tha', surpassing a billion views on YouTube. With a strong Facebook following of 8.2 million, he is also highly respected by Bollywood celebrities. Recently, a heartwarming video of Rahat Fateh Ali Khan’s warm interaction with Bollywood actor Sanjay Dutt has been making waves on social media. Shared by Rahat on his official Facebook account, the clip captures a backstage moment during Rahat's concert, which Sanjay Dutt attended. The two legendary figures were seen sharing a friendly exchange and even planned to meet again. A post shared by Ustad Rahat Fateh Ali Khan (@officialrfakworld)  Fans have been showering love on the touching interaction, celebrating the bond between these iconic artists.

Title: Hania Aamir lip-syncs Shalini Passi's iconic lines from 'Fabulous Lives...'
Content: Actor Hania Aamir recently delighted her fans with a playful Instagram video, lip-syncing to Shalini Passi's iconic lines from season three of 'Fabulous Lives of Bollywood Wives', The quotes, known for their sharp and dramatic tone, included:  - "I like things more than people because they don’t talk back."  - "The only reason I don't keep grudges against people is because...it affects my skin."  - "I'd rather jump into the deep ocean than be with you... all of you." A post shared by Hania Aamir 哈尼亚·阿米尔 (@haniaheheofficial)  Hania captioned the video, "nobody more iconic than shalini passi period (sic)." The post quickly went viral, earning praise from fans and even a response from Shalini Passi herself. Commenting on Hania’s post, Passi wrote, "Love you princess (sic)," to which Hania replied, "the queen herself (sic)."  At a recent Business Today Most Powerful Women Awards event, Shalini Passi reflected on her unique style and public persona. "I never wanted to be the 'it' girl because I am not the 'it' girl. It's my personal style. I was just having fun. I thought people might not like it because it's a little maximalist. The makeup artist told me not to put so many clips, but I just wanted to," she said. The Netflix series 'Fabulous Lives of Bollywood Wives' features Shalini Passi alongside Seema Sajdeh, Neelam Kothari, Maheep Kapoor, Bhavana Pandey, Riddhima Kapoor Sahni, and Kalyani Saha, with special appearances by Bollywood stars like Karan Johar, Gauri Khan, Ananya Panday, and Chunky Pandey. The show continues to entertain audiences with its glitzy portrayal of Bollywood's elite social circles.

Title: Karan-Arjun initially starred SRK, Ajay Devgn
Content: As the 1995 Bollywood blockbuster 'Karan Arjun' gears up for a re-release on November 22, filmmaker Rakesh Roshan has revealed surprising details about the film's original casting. In an interview, Rakesh disclosed that Ajay Devgn was initially considered for the role alongside Shah Rukh Khan, not Salman Khan. Rakesh shared that when he first conceptualized 'Karan Arjun', he approached Shah Rukh Khan, who had previously worked with him in the 1993 film 'King Uncle'. Interestingly, Rakesh Roshan was the first producer to pay Shah Rukh Khan, as his debut film 'Deewana' (1992) was still incomplete at the time. Rakesh also cast Ajay Devgn, with whom he had a long-standing connection through Ajay's father, action choreographer Veeru Devgn. Recalling the initial discussions, Rakesh said, “They both came to me – Shah Rukh and Ajay. They said, ‘Sir, we want to talk to you. We want to interchange our image. My (Shah Rukh's) image is romantic, his (Ajay's) image is of an action hero. I want to do action, and he'd do romantic.' I asked them how that would benefit the film. They got thinking. I said if it works in the film's favour, then only I'd do it no. 'If I do it, the film wouldn't work. I'm keeping in mind your image. I'd give him romance, and I'd also give you action to do. They both do action and romance. I'm making a wholesome film so you don't worry about that.' But they weren't convinced,” said Rakesh in Hindi.” When the initial pairing didn’t work out, Rakesh approached Salman Khan and Aamir Khan, fresh off their success in the 1994 cult classic 'Andaz Apna Apna'. However, Shah Rukh later returned. "Then Shah Rukh came back to me. He said, ‘No no, let me do it. You gave me my break. I'm getting sleepless nights that I'm not doing the film.' So I told Aamir that now I have Shah Rukh's dates,” Rakesh revealed. 'Karan Arjun', produced by Filmkraft Productions, stars Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan in the titular roles, alongside Kajol, Mamta Kulkarni, Raakhee, Amrish Puri, Johnny Lever, and Ranjit. The film remains a cult classic and a hallmark of Bollywood's reincarnation genre.

Title: Adnan Siddiqui meets King Charles III at Buckingham Palace
Content: Pakistani actor Adnan Siddiqui met with British King Charles III at Buckingham Palace during a prestigious event honouring global film and TV industry figures. The event, hosted by King Charles, celebrated the artistic contributions of artists from around the world, with Siddiqui among the distinguished guests. Sharing the experience with his fans on his Instagram account, Siddiqui described the brief but unforgettable meeting, expressing that even after the interaction, the thought of the King remained fresh in his mind. "Our conversation was brief but vibrant—a meeting of different worlds in the blink of an eye. His Majesty had a unique ability to put people at ease, leaving a lingering spark. It’s not every day you meet someone whose presence lingers in your thoughts long after the moment has passed," wrote Adnan with a few pictures from the event. A post shared by Adnan Siddiqui (@adnansid1)  At the event, King Charles personally greeted Siddiqui, shaking hands and appreciating his work in the entertainment industry. The occasion also marked the premiere of the highly anticipated 'Gladiator 2', featuring Hollywood stars such as Denzel Washington and Pedro Pascal. The premiere was a highlight of the evening, drawing attention from global film lovers and industry insiders. The event was further elevated by the presence of stars from iconic films such as 'Titanic' and 'Gladiator', with the costumes from some of the most celebrated dramas on display. The royal band added to the grandeur of the evening, playing a melodious tune to welcome the distinguished guests.

Title: First ever UAE contestant to debut at Miss Universe 2024
Content: For the first time, the UAE will be represented on the Miss Universe stage, with model and mother-of-three Emilia Dobreva taking on the role after being crowned Miss Universe UAE in a private audition held in October. National director for the UAE, Poppy Capella, appointed by the Miss Universe Organisation, praised Emilia as an ideal choice. “She was the perfect choice for Miss Universe UAE. She has been living in the UAE for over a decade, is married to an Emirati man, speaks Arabic and is a beautiful and smart woman.” A post shared by Missuniverseuae2024 (@missuniverseuae2024)  Emilia will join contestants from 130 countries at the Miss Universe grand finale in Mexico City on November 16. She will wear a unique abaya in the national costume round, featuring real sand from the UAE and design elements symbolizing the country’s modernity. “The bottom of her abaya will have real sand taken from the country and the top part of her abaya will reflect the modernity that this country has achieved. The gown will truly embody the UAE, showing how it has built up a modern country from the sand," Poppy said. Previously, only unmarried girls between 18 and 28 years of age were allowed to participate in the Miss Universe contest. But last year, Miss Universe lifted previous restrictions related to age, height, weight, and marital status, aiming to transform the event into a platform empowering women. Alongside the UAE, nine other countries are debuting at Miss Universe, including Somalia’s first hijabi contestant. A post shared by EMILIA DOBREVA 🇦🇪🇽🇰 (@miss_dobreva_official)  She added that respecting UAE culture was paramount. “Emilia will wear a fully covered swimsuit, also known as the burqini, in the swimwear round at the international competition. Her clothes are also modest, in line with the local culture.” The highlight of Miss Universe UAE was the stunning Dh15 million "Palm of Inclusion" crown, crafted by luxury jeweler Mouwad.

Title: Met Gala 2024: Alia Bhatt dazzles in Sabyasachi sari
Content: At the 2024 Met Gala, Bollywood star Alia Bhatt made a striking impression by doing away with the customary gowns and tiaras. Wearing a stunning shimmery sari designed by well-known designer Sabyasachi, Bhatt celebrated her Indian heritage to perfectly match the Garden of Time theme. Looking excited for the gala night, the Gangubai star spoke with Vogue on the red carpet. Alia made her debut at the Met Gala in 2023, turning heads with a stunning Prabal Gurung ensemble. This was her second appearance at the event. A post shared by Alia Bhatt 💛 (@aliaabhatt)  In reference to the Garden of Time theme, Bhatt states, "There is nothing more timeless than a sari," during her red carpet interview with Vogue for the 2024 Met Gala. The Heart of Stone actress looked stunning in a pastel green sari by Sabyasachi, accessorized with matching pieces designed by the designer. Bhatt exuded beauty with a delicate pastel green colour scheme that was enhanced by matching Sabyasachi jewellery and an amazing train that covered the whole red carpet. The evening was given a breath of fresh air by the intricate floral pattern, shimmering accents, and sweetheart neckline blouse adorned with a multicoloured floral theme. Pictures of Alia from the evening began to circulate on social media, and people were praising how beautifully her gorgeous outfit represented her Indian heritage. The actress also shared a gorgeous, behind-the-scenes photo on Instagram, omitting any details and just writing "Met Gala 2024" as the caption. ALIA BHATT SHOWING HOW ITS DONE, FOLLOWED THE THEME SO EFFORTLESSLY #AliaBhatt #MetGala pic.twitter.com/aHhbr6a4GY  In order to create this masterpiece for Alia's Met Gala appearance, 163 expert craftsmen worked 1,905 man-hours on the hand-embroidered saree. Anita Shroff Adajania skillfully styled Alia's captivating appearance, while Puneet Saini created the glitzy makeup and Amit Thakur did the elegant hair. In response to a question concerning her gorgeous Italian-made saree, Alia said she was excited to meet the skilled weavers who created it. What added to her charm was her sincere admiration for the workmanship. Alia embodied grace at the esteemed event in a six-yard gown, looking absolutely stunning.

Title: Iconic fashion designer Roberto Cavalli dies at 83
Content: Italian fashion designer Roberto Cavalli, who was well-known for creating animal-print designs that celebrities adored, passed away at the age of 83. According to his company, Cavalli, who founded his label in the early 1970s, had been unwell for a while. He is survived by his partner, Sandra Bergman Nilsson, and his six children. Sergio Azzolari, the CEO of Roberto Cavalli, posted on Instagram, saying: "The Roberto Cavalli company shares condolences with Mr. Cavalli's family, his legacy remains a constant source of inspiration." According to Italian news agency ANSA, the designer passed away at his Florence home on Friday. A post shared by Roberto Cavalli (@roberto_cavalli)  Cavalli was an extroverted art enthusiast who smoked a cigar and wore tinted glasses. He employed vibrant colours and patchwork effects in his frequently revealing creations. Along with his foray into real estate, he became well-known for operating the popular "Just Cavalli Cafe," a popular nightclub in the heart of Milan, where he often spent his evenings. Even though Giorgio Armani and Cavalli had very different styles, Armani claimed to have always had "enormous respect" for Cavalli. He wrote on social media platform X, "Roberto was a true artist, wild and wonderful in his use of prints, capable of transforming fantasy into seductive clothes." A well-known photo of American model Cindy Crawford from July 2000 features her walking down the Spanish Steps in Rome while wearing a long slip dress with a tiger face design by Cavalli.  Creative director of Roberto Cavalli, Fausto Puglisi, said, "You will be missed and you are loved by so many that your name will continue on, a beacon of inspiration for others, and especially for me." Owned by Auriel Investment SA, the Florence-based fashion group was saved in 2019 by Hussain Sajwani of Dubai.According to Italian media, Cavalli's funeral will take place in Florence on Monday.

Title: Entrepreneur Asad Malik brings top Pakistan brand to London's luxury district
Content: Entrepreneur Malik Asad and Mohsin Naveed Ranjha, a celebrated Pakistani fashion designer, have carved their name in history by becoming the first South Asian couturier to establish a dedicated design studio in London’s prestigious Regent Street district. Ranjha and entrepreneur Malik Asad launched the first Pakistani couture brand in London's Regent Street, marking a significant debut on the global fashion scene. The first ever of its kind project has been brought to Mortimer Street, just off Regent Street, by the creative director Mohsin Naveed Ranjha, managing director Abubakar Naveed Ranjha and fashion ecosystem pioneer Asad Malik. They said their MNR studio is set to redefine luxury and elegance – offering a wide range for both men and women. Mohsin Naveed Ranjha and Malik Asad, speaking at the event, shared that their choice to open in London followed thorough market research. They were convinced that London, especially the Regent Street, Oxford Circus, and Bond Street area, offered the perfect setting for their studio. Their goal is to cater to the British Asian community in the UK while also expanding the reach of Pakistani fashion to a broader audience. Lots of their clients are from India, including a large number of western-based Indian Punjabis, and Bangladesh and London would be the most suitable places. Bollywood actress Sonam Bajwa and dozens of leading Pakistani and Indian society figures attended the opulent launch which had hundreds of people queuing outside the studio to see the glamour on display inside the newly unveiled studio – showcasing richly-made, colourful designer clothes. Cresset CEO Malik Asad said the London launch was based on market research. “It’s all about credibility and good intentions. We are the people behind positioning fashion brands in Pakistan on the global landscape in terms of strategy, eCommerce, manufacturing, investments, and retail and we were always convinced about Mohsin’s global appeal. To set up in London’s inner heart is a huge privilege and we will be working with more Pakistani brands to take them global.” Bollywood’s Punjabi powerhouse actor Sonam Bajwa said people in London have been asking her about buying quality clothes for their special occasions. The actor said: "Now people don’t have to go to India and Pakistan to buy clothes for their weddings. Mohsin is in huge demand in India and overseas. Mohsin's journey is so much more than fashion. It is a representation of culture and community which inspires and uplifts. His presence in London symbolizes the global recognition of South Asian creativity and craftsmanship. I have known Mohsin since 2018 and I have been wearing his clothes ever since. I plan to visit Pakistan in the near future." Mohsin Naveed Ranjha said he wanted to come for a long time to the London hub to show Pakistani craft to the world. “Digital media has ended boundaries and our followers and clients have been asking us to come to London. Latest collections form Lahore, Karachi and Gujranawla and other cities will be available here and there will also be London exclusive collections at this store. We want more Pakistani designs to come to London. This is Pakistan’s soft image on display. Sikh brides from India and elsewhere have been messaging us and they have played a big role in our London launch,” said the creative director. Mohsin Naveed Ranjha said he was full of sentiments of pride and accomplishment. He commented. "To showcase the unparalleled talent and craftsmanship of our artisans, in the backdrop of one of the world’s most eligible fashion capitals, is a dream realized. My designs pay homage to the vibrant legacy and essence of the South Asian subcontinent, transcending boundaries to unveil its inherent beauty. I couldn’t be more thankful to have opened in London, humbly housed next to some of Europe's most coveted luxury brands."

Title: Paris Fashion Week: From mobile phone bans to PETA protests
Content: Paris Fashion Week, known for its extravagant displays and cutting-edge designs, has been buzzing with excitement as designers showcase their latest creations on the catwalk. From surprising moments to bold statements, here are some highlights from the prestigious event. The Row, the label founded by TV star sisters Ashley and Mary-Kate Olsen, made headlines by banning the use of phones at their show, opting instead for a more traditional approach with guests using notebooks and pencils to record their impressions. Chloe's debut by German designer Chemena Kamali added a touch of spontaneity and family love when her five-year-old son unexpectedly joined her on the catwalk for a hug, much to the delight of the audience. Animal rights organization PETA made a statement at Victoria Beckham's show, disrupting proceedings with slogans advocating for vegan leather and animal rights. Vetements, known for its subversive designs, presented oversized suits and unconventional pieces, including a coat made of teddy bears, raising eyebrows and prompting speculation about hidden meanings behind the collection. British popstar Sam Smith surprised attendees by walking the catwalk for Vivienne Westwood, donning a revealing tartan kilt and later appearing in a shredded black coat over a polka-dot top. Charaf Tajer's label Casablanca captivated the audience with luxury sportswear and stylish nightwear, accompanied by synchronized arm dancers in the background, adding a unique flair to the presentation. Belgium's Dries Van Noten showcased an eclectic collection featuring deconstructed sweaters, kimono-like coats, and bold accessories, earning praise for its blend of stylish restraint and statement pieces. Hermes took an innovative approach by incorporating a curtain of rain into their catwalk, providing a unique backdrop for their collection of luxurious outerwear inspired by equestrianism and motorbikes. As Paris Fashion Week continues to captivate fashion enthusiasts worldwide, these moments of creativity, spontaneity, and boldness serve as a testament to the industry's unwavering commitment to pushing boundaries and setting trends.

Title: Kate Middleton's style evolution: A year as Princess of Wales
Content: In her first full year as the Princess of Wales, Kate Middleton has undergone a remarkable style evolution while marking her 42nd birthday on January 9. As she stepped into her senior role alongside Prince William, the royal fashion expert, Christine Ross, observed a streamlined and vintage-inspired transformation in Kate's wardrobe. Over the past 12 months, Kate has not only increased her royal engagements but also played a significant role in high-profile ceremonies, including the coronation of her father-in-law, King Charles III. Charles, upon ascending to the throne in September 2022, appointed Prince William and Kate as the new Prince and Princess of Wales, emphasizing their role in inspiring and leading national conversations.  Since January 2023, Kate has settled into her new role, launching the "Shaping Us" early years awareness campaign, taking on military patronages, and increasing her presence in Wales. Alongside her professional growth, her style has undergone a notable evolution.  According to Christine Ross, Kate's style has embraced boldly-hued trouser suits, particularly when the Princess means business. For formal events, there's a vintage-inspired tone, adding a timeless quality to her looks. Notably, Kate's pantsuits, a staple of her working wardrobe, have been showcased in various colorways from designers like Alexander McQueen.  The princess's ability to seamlessly blend vintage-inspired looks with more statement outfits for important occasions, such as Garter Day at Windsor Castle or Royal Ascot, reflects a continuity that Ross believes creates timeless photo moments. Alessandra Rich dresses with an 1980s inspiration and Erdem's 1950s-evoking look at Commonwealth Day showcase Kate's ability to appear fresh and modern while maintaining a classic touch.  Despite her vintage-inspired choices, Kate's wardrobe doesn't confine her to a time-warp. Whether engaging with the Scouts or volunteering at a baby bank, she maintains her classic countryside style with skinny jeans, practical boots, and cozy jumpers.  As Kate enters a new year, anticipation is building for another collection of important engagements, with speculations of foreign travel and the usual showcase events like Trooping the Colour capturing the interest of royal fans.

Title: Urvashi Rautela sets record straight on Rishabh Pant dating rumors
Content: Bollywood actress Urvashi Rautela has once again addressed and dismissed the persistent rumors linking her to Indian cricketer Rishabh Pant. In a recent interview with the Indian media, the 30-year-old actress firmly denied any romantic involvement with Pant, emphasizing that the ongoing speculation is entirely unfounded. Rautela clarified, “These memes and rumors about me and Rishabh Pant are baseless. I prefer to keep my personal life private and am focused on my career, which I am deeply passionate about.” She further expressed the challenges of dealing with constant public scrutiny and the impact of baseless rumors on her personal life. However, she emphasized her commitment to transparency and honesty, choosing to address the speculation head-on rather than letting it affect her. “While it can be difficult to manage the relentless attention and unfounded rumors, I remain focused on my goals and purpose,” she said. She also acknowledged the importance of surrounding herself with supportive people who help her maintain her focus on what truly matters. The dating rumors between Urvashi Rautela and Rishabh Pant have circulated multiple times on social media, fueling widespread speculation. However, Rautela's recent statements make it clear that she is determined to put these rumors to rest and concentrate on her professional endeavors.

Title: 'The Legend of Maula Jatt' to finally release in India on Oct 2
Content: Acclaimed Pakistani blockbuster, 'The Legend of Maula Jatt', featuring Fawad Khan, Mahira Khan and Hamza Ali Abbasi in key roles, is set to finally screen in India on October 2. The announcement was made through the film's official Instagram account, where the makers confirmed, posting: "The Legend Of Maula Jatt's legacy lives on! Watch this cinematic masterpiece in Indian theatres starting October 2, 2024. Book your tickets now!" The post added, "P.S. Cinema lists to be shared soon." A post shared by The Legend of Maula Jatt (@maulajattofficial)  The film was originally scheduled for release in India in December 2022, but the launch was indefinitely postponed. Zee Studios, which holds the distribution rights, had planned to release the film in Delhi and Punjab but remained silent following the postponement. While the Central Board of Film Certification (CBFC) made no formal comments, sources indicated that theatre announcements were expected after securing CBFC clearance. There were earlier reports suggesting opposition to the film's release by the Indian political party Maharashtra Navnirman Sena (MNS), though the Punjab Censor Board was still anticipated to approve the film. TLOMJ first premiered on October 13, 2022, and went on to achieve a historic milestone by grossing over Rs4 billion worldwide by August 2023, making it the first Pakistani film to reach such a figure. With its upcoming release in India, it will become the first Pakistani movie to hit Indian theatres in over a decade, following Shoaib Mansoor's 'Bol'. Given the film's enormous success and star-studded cast, Indian fans are eagerly awaiting its arrival in cinemas.

Title: Javeria Abbasi ties the knot again, shares stunning Nikkah photos
Content: Pakistani drama star Javeria Abbasi recently celebrated a new chapter in her life by getting married, months after news of her engagement surfaced. The actress shared her joy with her fans on Instagram, posting a series of beautiful pictures from her intimate Nikah ceremony, along with the caption, “We love a happily ever after.” On her special day, the actress looked stunning in a dark magenta traditional outfit, adorned with golden embellishments, paired with a gold necklace that perfectly complemented her look. Her hands featured minimal henna designs and gold bangles, but it was the flower garlands that truly stood out, adding a delicate touch to the celebration. As she signed the marriage contract, her simple and elegant appearance won the hearts of her fans. A post shared by Juvaria Abbasi (@juvariaabbasi)  The ceremony seemed to be a small, private affair, likely held at her home. While not a grand celebration, the simplicity and love present made it memorable for those who admire the actor. Interestingly, she chose to keep her husband's identity private, as no pictures of the groom were shared. A few weeks ago, Javeria briefly shared a photo of herself with her husband in an Instagram story, which vanished after 24 hours. When asked about it, she confirmed to Geo.tv that the man in the picture was indeed her husband, but she preferred to keep the details private for a while. Back in May, the 51-year-old actress — who was previously married to her cousin and fellow actor Shamoon Abbasi and is the sister of Anoushay Abbasi — hinted at her engagement through a series of photos. While the images didn’t reveal any faces, they featured a ring on Javeria’s finger, clasped by a man’s hand, making it clear to her followers that she had received a proposal. Javeria Abbasi’s wedding news has delighted fans, as they continue to send her love and best wishes for this new journey in her life.

Title: Hina Khan’s health update: Actress discloses new disease
Content: Hina Khan, the Indian actress, who has worked in Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai and Kasautii Zindagii Ki, is fighting cancer and is very much active on her social media posting about her struggle. Recently, she opened up about the struggles she went through during chemotherapy; she especially underlined that this therapy is painful.The Bollywood actress recorded, on Instagram, the day she shaved her hair while receiving chemotherapy. She was emotional while having her hair shaved as part of treatment. The emotional video also included Hina’s mother who was crying, but she was very brave at that time. Despite the struggle, she posted to her followers about her going back to work after the completion of her first chemotherapy session. A post shared by 𝑯𝒊𝒏𝒂 𝑲𝒉𝒂𝒏 (@realhinakhan) In one of the later updates, she posted another video where she is shaving her head which is referring to the girl’s decision to grow stronger no the disease. In her response to her fans, she said that even though she had rarely posted on her social media pages for sometime now, she was struggling to go through very some hard days. A post shared by 𝑯𝒊𝒏𝒂 𝑲𝒉𝒂𝒏 (@realhinakhan) Most recently, Hina has shared with her audience one of the worst symptoms of chemotherapy known as mucositis, which leads to pain and discomfort. In the latest post, she also narrated her story and left a question inviting her followers who might be in a similar situation to give their advice or any tips that can be offered. Hina said that not being able to eat was a problem, and she wanted to know if there is advice that could help her to cope with this pain.Fans have showered tremendous support to Hina Khan because of her bravery and willingness to share her experience with cancer and she is still fighting the disease with a positive attitude.

Title: Mahira Khan’s dance to ‘Laila Mein Laila’ goes viral, fans buzz with excitement
Content: Pakistani superstar Mahira Khan has once again captured the internet's attention, this time with a video of her dancing to the popular Bollywood song Laila Mein Laila. The song, which originally featured in her Bollywood debut film Raees (2017) opposite Shah Rukh Khan, has a special place in the hearts of her fans. In the video shared on Instagram, Mahira is seen effortlessly dancing in a chic outfit—a pair of blue pants paired with a white silk top. Her confident moves and radiant smile have resonated with her followers, making the video go viral across social media platforms. A post shared by Mahira Khan (@mahirahkhan)  Captioning the video, Mahira wrote, "We work really hard... but it's important to have fun every chance we get." Her post has been widely appreciated, with fans praising her for balancing work with moments of joy. Mahira Khan, who is known for her remarkable performances in both Pakistani and Bollywood films, will soon be making her debut in the Netflix series Jo Bache Hain Sang Samet Lo. The series has generated significant buzz, and her fans are eagerly awaiting its release. With her latest viral moment, anticipation for her upcoming project has only heightened.

Title: Smashed hotel room, narcotics found as Liam Payne death probe unfolds
Content: One Direction pop star Liam Payne died of multiple traumas and internal bleeding after plunging from a hotel balcony in Buenos Aires, prosecutors said on Thursday, adding an initial search suggested the fall came after substance abuse. Payne, 31, who shot to global fame with the boy band, was found dead after he fell from a third-floor hotel room balcony in Buenos Aires on Wednesday, triggering an outpouring of fan tributes. In the first official details of the autopsy, the prosecutors office said coroners had found 25 injuries compatible with those caused by a fall from height, including fatal head injuries, with internal and external bleeding. It added that there were no signs of a third party being involved, though the incident was being investigated as a "suspicious death" out of protocol. "Everything indicates that the musician was alone when the fall occurred, and was going through some kind of episode due to substance abuse," the prosecutors office said. "City police who surveyed the scene found substances inside the room that at first glance - and pending confirmation from the experts - would be narcotics and alcoholic beverages, as well as several destroyed objects and furniture," it added. Police earlier said in a statement they had found the room in "total disorder" in a search after his death, with various things smashed and medications scattered around. While details surrounding his death remain unclear, Payne had spoken publicly about his struggles with mental health and using alcohol to cope with the pressures of fame. The city police said that in the atrium of the hotel where Payne had fallen they had found a bottle of whiskey, a lighter and a cellphone. They said they had collected fingerprints from those. In the room of the luxury hotel in the city's trendy Palermo district, police said they found over-the-counter medications, energy packs and anxiety drug Clonazepam. "Upon entering, total disorder was observed, with various elements broken," the police said in a statement, adding they had taken more fingerprints and other evidence to be analysed in labs, as well as a notebook and passport. "The balcony area was inspected in order to establish access to it," the police force added. Before Payne's fall, a hotel employee had called emergency services, asking for help with a guest who was trashing his room and appeared to be under the influence of drugs or alcohol, audio obtained from the Buenos Aires security ministry showed. "We have a guest who is intoxicated by drugs and alcohol. And, well, he's ... When he's conscious, he breaks, he's breaking the whole room. And, well, we need you to send someone, please," the hotel worker told police in the 911 call. "We need you to send someone urgently because, well, I don't know if the guest's life is at risk. He is in a room with a balcony. And, well, we are a little afraid that he will do something that will put his life at risk." One Direction found global success after Simon Cowell brought together Payne, Harry Styles, Zayn Malik, Niall Horan and Louis Tomlinson on Britain's X Factor talent show in 2010. They went on to sell 70 million records, with six top-10 hits on Billboard's Hot 100, including "What Makes You Beautiful", "Story of My Life" and "Live While We're Young". Payne's co-writing credits included "Story of My Life" and "Night Changes".

Title: Karan Johar gives shoutout to Chahat Fateh Ali Khan's 'Tauba Tauba'
Content: Social media star Chahat Fateh Ali Khan, who rose to fame with his song 'Bado Badi', is once again in the spotlight after sharing his rendition of the popular song 'Tauba Tauba' on Instagram. The song, originally from the Vicky Kaushal-starrer 'Bad Newz', became a massive hit thanks to its catchy beats and unique dance moves. Chahat's version caught even more attention when Bollywood producer Karan Johar reshared it on his Instagram, encouraging that fans 'must watch' the song.  Chahat's rendition received mixed to negative feedback from viewers. As the catchy tune quickly went viral, the singer of the original song, Karan Aujla, himself couldn’t resist chiming in with a humorous comment on the new version. Under Chahat's post, he jokingly wrote, "Uncle na karo please". The response ignited a flurry of sarcastic comments from netizens, with one user quipping, "Karan Aujla crying in the corner." Also Read: Karan Aujla's hilarious reaction to Chahat Fateh Ali Khan’s ‘Tauba Tauba’ remix Others added their own humorous takes, with remarks like "Karan himself said uncle to stop" and "aapka gaana - toba toba," further emphasizing the playful banter. Karan Aujla's original ‘Tauba Tauba’ was an instant hit, featuring Vicky Kaushal’s dynamic dance performance in ‘Bad Newz,’ which also starred Ammy Virk and Triptii Dimri. As the lighthearted feud continues, fans are enjoying the playful dynamics between these two talented artists.

Title: Chahat Fateh Ali Khan ventures into English music
Content: Chahat Fateh Ali Khan, whose real name is Kashif Rana, has gained significant popularity on social media for his humorous singing style. Known for his quirky and entertaining performances, the British Pakistani singer has now stepped into the world of English music, much to the delight of his fans. Chahat first went viral in 2022, when a fun video of his singing garnered millions of views, earning him a massive following. He became a sensation with his unique take on the song “Akh Haldi Badu Badi,” which accumulated 28 million views on YouTube before it was removed due to copyright issues. His rendition was so popular that even Indian social media users and celebrities shared it widely on their reels. Apart from his viral hits, Chahat also made headlines last year for singing a track for the Pakistan Super League, further cementing his fame. This year, he has thrilled his international fanbase by transitioning into English music. Recently, a video of Chahat singing an English romantic song went viral. In the clip, he can be seen in a hotel alongside an Englishman, with an audience eagerly recording his performance. When asked to sing an English song for the guest, Chahat shared a few lines from a song he’s currently writing, receiving applause from the crowd. The Englishman confirmed his admiration for the singer, saying he had seen Chahat on TikTok and was a big fan.

Title: Fans in awe: Diljit Dosanjh’s ‘Naat’ video receives overwhelming love
Content: Global superstar Diljit Dosanjh continues to captivate his fans with unexpected surprises during his 'Dilluminati Tour'. Recently, fans were thrilled when international pop sensation Ed Sheeran made a surprise appearance at one of Diljit’s concerts. The collaboration took social media by storm, adding to the growing excitement surrounding Diljit’s tour. A post shared by DILJIT DOSANJH (@diljitdosanjh)  The 'Dilluminati Tour', which recently announced a Paris chapter, has been making headlines for its sold-out shows and viral concert videos. Tickets for the Indian leg of the tour, starting on October 26, sold out within minutes of going on sale, reflecting the immense popularity of the Punjabi singer-actor. A post shared by DILJIT DOSANJH (@diljitdosanjh)  In a recent Instagram post, Diljit shared a video of himself interacting with fans after a concert, where he graciously accepted gifts from them. While his humble demeanor always wins hearts, it was the words accompanying the video that caught the most attention. Diljit posted a Sufi Kalam, "How can I thank you for the grace of my Prophet, peace and blessings be upon him?" which resonated deeply with his followers. A post shared by DILJIT DOSANJH (@diljitdosanjh)  The post received an outpouring of love, particularly from his Muslim fans, who were pleasantly surprised by Diljit’s choice of song. The comment section was filled with expressions of joy and appreciation, further solidifying his connection with a diverse global audience. A post shared by DILJIT DOSANJH (@diljitdosanjh)  Diljit’s 'Dilluminati Tour India' is set to kick off on October 26 at the Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium in Delhi, before moving on to other major cities including Hyderabad, Ahmedabad, Lucknow, Pune, Kolkata, Bangalore, Indore, Chandigarh, and Guwahati. With each performance, Diljit continues to prove why he is not just a superstar, but a beloved icon who knows how to touch the hearts of his fans worldwide.

Title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs sued for sexual assault by former Bad Boy Records singer
Content: Dawn Richard, a former singer for Bad Boy Records, has filed a lawsuit accusing music mogul and the label's founder Sean "Diddy" Combs of sexual assault and battery, sex trafficking, gender discrimination and fraud, according to court documents. Richard filed the suit on Tuesday in the Southern District of New York, also suing former Bad Boy Entertainment CEO Harve Pierre. The legal action by Richard was filed one day after a Michigan prison inmate was awarded a $100 million judgment against the rapper, a judgment Combs' attorney said he would seek to have dismissed. The inmate, Derrick Lee Smith, had accused Combs of drugging and sexually assaulting him at a party almost 30 years ago. Richard belonged to girl group Danity Kane and R&B trio Diddy Dirty Money, which included Combs and singer Kalenna Harper. The groups were part of Bad Boy Records. Combs' attorney, Erica Wolff, said in a statement on Tuesday that the rapper is eager to prove Richard's claims are false in the courtroom. "Mr. Combs is shocked and disappointed by this lawsuit. In an attempt to rewrite history, Dawn Richard has now manufactured a series of false claims all in the hopes of trying to get a pay day — conveniently timed to coincide with her album release and press tour," Wolff wrote. "If Ms. Richard had such a negative experience with Making the Band and Danity Kane, she would not have chosen to continue working directly with Mr. Combs for Dirty Money, nor would she have returned for the Making the Band reboot in 2020 or agreed to be featured on The Love Album last year," she added. During her time working with Combs, Richard alleged in the suit, the rapper repeatedly groped her, was physically violent, and trapped her in a car while threatening her life. Richard met Combs during her audition for his MTV series "Making the Band" in 2004, which was when she alleges he began displaying inappropriate behavior. "(Combs) manipulated her with mantras that submission to his depraved demands was necessary for career advancement, instilling in her the belief that such abuse and exploitation were required for female artists to succeed in the music industry," the lawsuit said. In the lawsuit, Richard also said she witnessed Combs abusing his then-girlfriend, the R&B vocalist Cassandra Ventura. Last year, Combs settled a lawsuit filed by Ventura that had accused him of serial physical abuse, sexual slavery and rape. Combs is one of the most influential producers and executives in hip-hop and was a hugely successful performer, as well as the impresario of his own Sean John clothing line.

Title: Melt: Where smash burgers reign supreme!
Content: Smash beef burgers are definitely having a moment in the bustling gastronomic landscape of Lahore where culinary trends disappear in no time! They've grown from your small takeaway spots to popular dine-in options, with quite a few springing up around town in the recent past. With some confidently marketed as ‘gourmet’, what’s special about them is the focus on the patty: these burgers aren’t your elaborate, layered, dripping with sauces and veggies burgers, but pretty simple, unassuming, and letting the high-quality beef shine like a star. Their patties are juicy, chunky and have a slightly crispy, caramelized crust, while the burgers are usually accompanied by classic toppings such as cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and a signature sauce. One of the popular brands serving such burgers is Melt, located in the bustling market of DHA Phase 4. Having relaunched recently, the outlet is more conducive for a takeaway than dine-in considering their limited seating capacity. The interior is quite simple and basic following a yellow and white theme, with a handful of tables set up on the mezzanine floor above the open kitchen. The menu is minimal and fairly basic, with only five selections for beef smash and chicken fillet burgers, as well as a few chicken fillet wraps, crinkle cut fries, shakes, and ice cream. We recently paid a visit to the restaurant to try their 'premium' smash burger. We began the meal with their starters: Mozzarella Bites and Cheetos Poppers. The Mozzarella Bites were absolute pleasure! These golden nuggets were a sheer treat, crispy on the exterior and filled with molten, almost elastic cheese that oozed out as soon as you bit into them. And when dipped in their spicy, tangy sauce, they're finger-licking good! A post shared by MELT (@meltpk)  Similarly, the Cheetos Poppers, which resembled rocks of ruby in a little tub from a distance, were a revelation. Soft, tender chunks of chicken coated with blazing red crushed Cheetos, dip them into the spicy sauce and they can be devoured in numbers. A post shared by MELT (@meltpk)  What was supposed to be an appetizer, turned into a mini meal; they were THAT good! Up next were the main entrées, so to say, for which we ordered three kinds of beef burgers and loaded fries.
